mapper.select: select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from GOODS order by GOODS_SALE_NUMBER desc) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 3
select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from FUNDING order by FUNDING_AMOUNT desc) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 3
select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from CREATOR order by CREATOR_NAME asc) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 3
